events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and I would like to request a refund since this is not what I paid for.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to incorrect item delivery.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for your order.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm here to assist you with your refund request for the incorrect item you received.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue?
Here is my order number 123456 and attached is the photo showing the item that does not match my order description.
Thank you for the information. We will process your refund immediately and send you a prepaid return label to return the wrong item.
Thank you for the quick response. I appreciate you handling this so efficiently and look forward to receiving the label.
Your refund has been initiated and the return label is sent to your email. Please use it to return the incorrect item at your convenience.
Just checking in to confirm if you managed to return the item and if the refund has been completed to your satisfaction.
Since we have not heard any further issues, we are closing your case. Please contact us anytime if you need more assistance.
